text: Ümit Dündar (born in 1955) is a Turkish general who was temporarily Chief of the General Staff of the Turkish Armed Forces while Hulusi Akar was being held hostage by coup forces during the 2016 Turkish coup d'état attempt. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish Army generals Category:Chiefs of General Staff of Turkey Category:People involved in the 2016 Turkish coup d'état attempt
title: Ümit Dündar
